subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In Game 3 of the Suns’ first-round playoff series against the Spurs, Tony Parker exploded for a career-high 41 points to lead San Antonio to a 115-99 victory.
snippet: In Game 3 of the Suns’ first-round playoff series against the Spurs, Tony Parker exploded for a career-high 41 points to lead San Antonio to a 115-99 victory.
